mdRecord.dcterms:title: Devonshire: with Excester described, and the armes of such Nobles as have borne the titles of them
Devonshire with Excester described and the armes of such Nobles as haue borne the titles of them
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Humble, George, -1640
Speed, John, 1552?-1629
Sudbury, John.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Performed by Ihon Speede and are to be sold in popes-head Alleye by Iohn Sudburi & George Humble. Cum privilegio
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 38 x 51 cm on sheet 42 x 56 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Insets: Plan of "Excester" and 8 coats of arms of nobility.
Table of "places of the citie by fygures..."
On verso: English text with running-title "Book I. Devon-Shire. Chap. 10", Signature "O", p. 19-20.
Originally issued ca. 1611, and appeared in: Theatre of the Empire of Great Britaine. London, Sudbury & Humble, 1614 (i.e. 1616)
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Some town names have been underlined in red. Small fold separation at bottom center.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Devon (England)--Maps--Early works to 1800.
Exeter (England)--Maps--Early works to 1800.
